name: 8th Edition of Global Conference on Pharmaceutics and Novel Drug Delivery Systems
content: After the prodigious success of our 5 editions of Pharma conference, Magnus Group is pleased to invite you to its hybrid event “8th Edition of Global Conference on Pharmaceutics and Novel Drug Delivery Systems” Pharma 2023 scheduled during March 13-15, 2023 at Singapore. The conference will deliberate on the theme “Decadal Overview of Recent Trends and Innovations Changing the Pharma Industry.” The rise of biopharma and concerns about patient compliance have prompted us to adopt a drug delivery strategy from development to manufacture. Every year, we see discoveries and innovations at every stage of medication development. The Global Summit provides you with the latest cutting-edge and fascinating research. This three-day international event will feature more than 70 plenary speakers from around the world and more than 25 keynote speakers, including academicians, pharmacists and industry leaders. It's a place where people will come together to discuss issues that arise during real-time practices or research and come up with a variety of awareness and solution-oriented talks. Pharma 2023 Conferences are gatherings that focus on information sharing, research ideas, and specialized methodologies and issues in the pharmaceutical field. Our renowned honorary speakers will offer you with the most clinically up-to-date relevant information, and you will leave more informed and energized than you ever imagined. Reach us at: Contact Email: pharmadds@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988-2320 WhatsApp: +1(779)429 2143 Dates: March 13-15, 2023 Venue: Singapore Website: https://magnusconferences.com/pharmaceutical-sciences/ Abstract submission: https://magnusconferences.com/pharmaceutical-sciences/submit-abstract Registration: https://magnusconferences.com/pharmaceutical-sciences/register Social Media Link: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PharmaConfer Twitter: https://twitter.com/ConferencPharma LinkedIn: YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Organiser: Magnus Group LLC - https://www.magnusgroup.org/ Conference Manager: Laura Greene Organiser Address: Magnus Group LLC 150 South Wacker Drive #2400 Chicago,IL60606,USA Pharma 2023 | Pharmaceutics 2023 | Pharmaceutics and Novel Drug Delivery Systems 2023 | Pharma Congress 2023 | Pharma Conferences | Pharma Conference 2023 | Pharma Events | Drug Delivery 2023 | Pharmaceutics and Novel Drug Delivery Systems Conferences | Drug Delivery Systems Congress | Drug Delivery Conference 2023 | Novel Drug Delivery Conference | Novel Drug Delivery Congress 2023 | USA Pharma Conference | Pharmacology Conference | Clinical Case Report conference 2023 | Pharmaceuticals conference 2023 | Drug Delivery Technology 2023 conference | International Pharma Conference | Pharmaceutics and Novel Drug Delivery Systems | Advance drug Delivery conference
